name: @tracktik/tt-image-handler
description: A Lambda function for performing on-demand image edits and manipulations.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm install --arch=x64 --platform=linux && npm run build:tsc
scripts.include-solution-utils: npm run solution-utils:prep && npm run solution-utils:package
scripts.package: npm run build && npm ci --omit=dev && node ./dist/image-handler/package.js && rm ./dist/image-handler/package.js ./dist/image-handler/package.js.map && rsync -avrq ./node_modules ./dist && npm run include-solution-utils
scripts.solution-utils:package: cd ../solution-utils && npm run package && cd dist/ && rsync -avrq . ../../image-handler/dist/solution-utils/ && cd ../../image-handler
